definitions.definition: Impassioned allegiance to or advocacy of the establishment , maintenance , and/or interests of a particular king , royal house , or kingly dynasty ; sometimes extended to the same of a non-royal (i.e., grand ducal , imperial , or other) family or sovereign ; often contrasted with monarchism .

main_definition: Impassioned allegiance to or advocacy of the establishment , maintenance , and/or interests of a particular king , royal house , or kingly dynasty ; sometimes extended to the same of a non-royal (i.e., grand ducal , imperial , or other) family or sovereign ; often contrasted with monarchism .
